definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: The reason Burundi is so poor is because they have never really had any peaceful time between the everlasting civil wars.
sentences.chinese: 這個國家貧窮的真正原因是因爲連綿不絕的內戰。

sentences.english: The real war will never get in the books.
sentences.chinese: 真正的戰爭永遠會隱沒於歷史的黑暗面。

sentences.english: The existing vaccines can only reduce the amount of virus, rather than totally inactivating it.
sentences.chinese: 當前的疫苗只會減少病毒數量，並非真正殺滅病毒。

sentences.english: Adorno attempts to build real nature aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 阿多諾力圖建立真正的自然美學。

sentences.english: What we would really like to do is get the image descriptor from the image registry.
sentences.chinese: 我們真正想做的是從圖像註冊表獲取圖像描述符。

sentences.english: Hooley 's Irish Pub brings an authentic slice of Irish culture to Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 胡利的愛爾蘭酒吧給廣州帶來了真正的愛爾蘭文化片。

sentences.english: Vedanta defines the real as being permanent and the unreal as being temporary.
sentences.chinese: 韋丹塔界定真正作爲常任理事國和虛幻是暫時的。

sentences.english: You never actually stood there and looked up at that beautiful ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 你從來沒有真正地站在那裏，看那美麗的天花板。

sentences.english: Ultimately, being with a true soul partner is all about being purposeful in love.
sentences.chinese: 在愛情中擁有一位真正的靈魂伴侶是每個人所希冀的。

sentences.english: I knew that I am a genuine double-dealer.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，我纔是一個真正的兩面派。

sentences.english: Inter-group cooperation is the engine of real progress at the grassroots.
sentences.chinese: 在基層民衆中，組織內部的合作更是真正進步的動力。

sentences.english: The beholder likes to use this ray on any foe it considers a real threat.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔喜歡將此射線用於它認爲真正有威脅的對手。

sentences.english: Sneaking out may seem like a real option in the heat of anger.
sentences.chinese: 盛怒之下，偷偷溜出去看上去似乎是真正的解決之道。

sentences.english: Mrs…has never really got on with her daughter-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 老太太從未與兒媳婦兒真正和睦相處過。

sentences.english: For all its troubles, it seems that the US is still the real Middle Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 儘管危機重重，美國似乎仍是真正的“中央王國”。

sentences.english: Comrades! What is a true bastion of iron?
sentences.chinese: 同志們，真正的銅牆鐵壁是什麼？

definition: a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to be capable of/to be able to/can
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
